summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of 25th Avenue Northeast, from East 60th Street to East 65th Street; all in The City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6874 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds", and declaring an emergency.
